Package view.common.components

Class MyComponents

java.lang.Object
view.common.components.MyComponents
public class MyComponents extends Object
MyComponents is a collection of standardized JComponents for better styling
Author:
Sean Benedict Bernardo, Luis Andrew Madridijo
